main event: On November 24, 1967, an unidentified phenomenon was observed in Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as bright and oval-shaped,The sighting lasted for several minutes,It was reported to be moving slowly and then disappeared rapidly,The report includes a mention of possible multiple witnesses to the sighting,There were also instructions in the report regarding filling out additional forms for further investigation
witness description: The witness described a bright, oval-shaped object that hovered and then accelerated away.
